GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
rapidio: fix possible UAF when kfifo_alloc() fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 5ee850645e42f541ce1ea8130c2b27cc495f965c, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit e8de370188d098bb49483c287b44925957c3c9b6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: rapidio: fix possible UAF when kfifo_alloc() fails
